item.title: About
item.description: I am a postdoc and a member of the CO3 or Consciousness, Cognition & Computation Group at the CRNC. Before coming to Brussels I worked in the Situated Cognition Research Group at the Ruhr-Universität Bochum where, among other things, I carried out a Volkswagen Foundation research grant on the psychology and epistemology of conspiracy theories. My doctoral research was also conducted at the Ruhr-Universität and was supervised by Tobias Schlicht and Daniel Dennett.
